outputs.output_descr: Throughout the project, Fiji will receive support for the establishment of necessary energy policy and regulatory frameworks and undertake renewable energy resource assessments, renewable energy-based power generation demonstrations and institutional strengthening. The project is expected to facilitate investments in renewable energy-based power generation in Fiji, which will support the socio-economic development of the country, enable utilization of available resources and contribute to reduced greenhouse gas emissions resulting from less dependence on fossil fuel.
